name: Vegan Gnocchi with Spinach and Tomatoes
description: These vegan gnocchi with a creamy cashew sauce, spinach, and tomatoes is the perfect weeknight meal. It's super easy to make and incredibly comforting! It's ready in only 15 minutes!
recipeIngredient: 1 17.6 OZ (500 g) package store-bought gnocchi (make sure to choose a vegan brand)

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the gnocchi according to the instructions on the package. Place the spinach in a colander and drain the gnocchi over it (this is an easy trick to wilt fresh spinach).
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the gnocchi according to the instructions on the package. Place the spinach in a colander and drain the gnocchi over it (this is an easy trick to wilt fresh spinach).

recipeInstructions.text: Make the sauce: place all ingredients in a high speed blender and process until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the sauce: place all ingredients in a high speed blender and process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the sauce into a large pot and heat until it thickens up. Add the gnocchi, the spinach, and the diced tomatoes. Cook for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the sauce into a large pot and heat until it thickens up. Add the gnocchi, the spinach, and the diced tomatoes. Cook for another minute.

keywords: vegan gnocchi, vegan gnocchi recipe, vegan gnocchi sauce
